About

I‚Äôm a 3rd-year Ph.D. student at Caltech, advised by Prof. Garnet Chan and Prof. John Preskill. I‚Äôm particularly interested in quantum computing and quantum chemistry. Recently I‚Äôve been working on tensor network methods and quantum algorithms.

Previously, I obtained my B.S. from UC Irvine with a double major in physics and computer science. I had research experiences with Prof. Steve White on tensor network methods and with Prof. Kieron Burke on density functional theory.
